articles.summaryJa: Scientists でMassachusetts Institute の技術 have devised 方法 のための大きい language models に保つ 学習 でfly—ステップ toward building AI その継続的に 改善 itself.

articles.title: Getting Started with Cassandra: Installation and Setup Guide
articles.titleJa: Getting 開始した とCassandra: Installation とSetup Guide
articles.summary: Apache Cassandra is a distributed NoSQL database for managing massive data with high availability. This guide covers its installation on Linux, Windows, and macOS.
articles.summaryJa: Apache Cassandra is distributed NoSQL database のためのmanaging 大規模な データ と高い availability. このguide covers そのinstallation でLinux, Windows, とmacOS.

articles.title: Plug and Play: Build a G-Assist Plug-In Today
articles.titleJa: Plug と再生: 構築 G-Assist Plug-で今日
articles.summary: Project G-Assist — available through the NVIDIA App — is an experimental AI assistant that helps tune, control and optimize NVIDIA GeForce RTX systems.
articles.summaryJa: プロジェクト G-Assist — 利用可能な through NVIDIA App — is experimental AI assistant その支援 tune, control とoptimize NVIDIA GeForce RTX systems.

articles.title: Authors Are Posting TikToks to Protest AI Use in Writing—and to Prove They Aren’t Doing It
articles.titleJa: Authors Are Posting TikToks にProtest AI 使用 でWriting—とにProve They Aren’t Doing It
articles.summary: Traditional and indie authors are flooding #WritersTok with videos of them editing their manuscripts to refute accusations of generative AI use—and bring readers into their very human process.
articles.summaryJa: 伝統的な とindie authors are flooding #WritersTok とvideos のthem editing それらのmanuscripts にrefute accusations の生成AI 使用—と持参 readers into それらの非常に 人間 プロセス.

articles.title: Preparing for future AI risks in biology
articles.titleJa: Preparing のための将来の AI risks でbiology
articles.summary: Advanced AI can transform biology and medicine—but also raises biosecurity risks. We’re proactively assessing capabilities and implementing safeguards to prevent misuse.
articles.summaryJa: 高度な AI can 変革 biology とmedicine—しかし また raises biosecurity risks. We’re proactively assessing capabilities とimplementing safeguards にprevent misuse.

articles.title: DeepNVMe: Affordable I/O scaling for Deep Learning Applications
articles.titleJa: DeepNVMe: Affordable I/O scaling のためのディープラーニング Applications
articles.summary: Introduction We introduced DeepNVMe in summer 2024 as a suite of optimizations for tackling I/O bottlenecks in Deep Learning (DL). DeepNVMe delivers significant speedups for I/O bound DL workloads by leveraging storage.
articles.summaryJa: Introduction We introduced DeepNVMe でsummer 2024 としてsuite のoptimizations のためのtackling I/O bottlenecks でディープラーニング (DL). DeepNVMe 配信 significant speedups のためのI/O bound DL workloads によってleveraging storage.

articles.title: How Anomalo solves unstructured data quality issues to deliver trusted assets for AI with AWS
articles.titleJa: どのようにAnomalo solves unstructured データ quality issues に配信 信頼された assets のためのAI とAWS
articles.summary: In this post, we explore how you can use Anomalo with Amazon Web Services (AWS) AI and machine learning (AI/ML) to profile, validate, and cleanse unstructured data collections to transform your data lake into a trusted source for production ready AI initiatives.
articles.summaryJa: でこのpost, we explore どのようにyou can 使用 Anomalo とAmazon Web Services (AWS) AI と機械学習 (AI/ML) にprofile, validate, とcleanse unstructured データ collections に変革 your データ lake into 信頼された source のためのproduction 準備ができている AI initiatives.
